title: Marketplace for Tuesday, April 23, 2013
description: Boston Strong started out as a call to support those in Boston, but now some are trying to trademark the phrase. Can you actually do that? And today's show heads to the kitchen. We're talking to author Michael Pollan and a guy who set out to review hundreds of grills.
byline: Stacey Vanek Smith, David Gura, Shannon Mullen, Queena Kim, Kai Ryssdal and Sam Beard
teaser: Boston Strong started out as a call to support those in Boston, but now some are trying to trademark the phrase. Can you actually do that? And today's show heads to the kitchen. We're talking to author Michael Pollan and a guy who set out to review hundreds of grills.
